items.summary: Create a new standalone ATS-friendly Resume Generator tool as its own dedicated route/page in the existing TanStack Router setup, implemented as a step-by-step wizard (not a single form) that covers all key resume sections: Contact details, Professional summary, Skills (hard + soft), Work experience (ATS action verbs + metrics prompts), Education, Certifications, Projects, and Keyword suggestions.

On the ATS Resume Generator page, generate an ATS-friendly, single-column resume output preview from the wizard inputs and provide one-click export options: (1) copy the full resume as plain text to clipboard and (2) download the resume as a .txt file.

Integrate the ATS Resume Generator page into the existing SEO and routing system: register the new route in the router, add an entry in the SEO route metadata configuration (title/description/keywords/canonicalPath), and include the new URL in the static sitemap.xml.

Add an entry point to access the new ATS Resume Generator from the existing UI by adding a new tool card in the "Resume & Placement Help" section that opens the ATS Resume Generator in a dedicated page/route (not in a modal), while keeping the existing four resume tool cards unchanged.
